about_the_game:
This is a desktop version that can be played without a VR headset.
The desktop version allows you to move the camera freely, so you can enjoy various viewpoints.
Wearing headphones is recommended to enjoy the stereo sound.
Intuitive and easy operation with mouse and keyboard.



How to operate the desktop version

Launch file GirlfriendVR_desktop\GirlfriendVR.exe
*No VR equipment is required, but gaming PC specs are recommended.

W key: move forward
S key: move backward
A key: move left
D key: move right
E key: move up
Q key: move down

Left mouse click: Decision, touch operation
Mouse operation while holding down the right mouse button: Viewpoint control
Mouse scroll: Move forward/backward
Mouse operation while holding down mouse scroll: move up/down/left/right
